author: jimmygchen
content:
<@412614104222531604> not sure if all clients have implemented the publish (blinded) block v2 endpoints, but looks like it's in scope on the devnet-6 spec?

PR: https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/pull/321

devnet-6 spec
https://notes.ethereum.org/@bbusa/dencun-devnet-6

author: jimmygchen
content: ah i see the publish block v2 endpoint (PR-317) in devnet-7 PR candidates, PR-321 is the Deneb changes for the same endpoint, so i think it can go to devnet-7 candidate

author: .paulharris
content: Apparently we're going to need all the blobs for the entire availability window to be able to contribute once we're on deneb? is there somewhere that has an overview of why that decision was made? it seems like a big step backwards and i'd like to get across the reasoning...
